analysis: The project is a test website focused on black holes. The current theme is not fully developed, and there are several pending tasks related to UI improvements. The website needs a cohesive black hole theme with animations and interactive elements.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes.
Complete the JavaScript content to ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and functionality, including animations and interactions for the black hole theme.
